英文法規名稱: Standard for the Tolerance of Polychlorinated Biphenyl in Foods
中文法規名稱: 食品中多氯聯苯限量標準

法規內容.條文內容: This Standard is prescribed in accordance with the provisions of Article 17 of the Act Governing Food Sanitation.

The tolerance of polychlorinated biphenyl in foods shall meet the following standards:
┌──────────────┬──────┬────────┐
│Category                    │Tolerance   │Remarks         │
│                            │（ppm）     │                │
├──────────────┼──────┼────────┤
│Milk and milk products      │0.5         │Fat basis       │
├──────────────┼──────┼────────┤
│Meats                       │1.0         │Fat basis       │
├──────────────┼──────┼────────┤
│Eggs                        │0.2         │                │
├──────────────┼──────┼────────┤
│Deepsea fishes and          │0.5         │Edible portions │
│shellfishes                 │            │                │
│                            │            │                │
│Inshore and coastal fishes  │1.0         │                │
│and shellfishes             │            │                │
│                            │            │                │
│Freshwater and aquacultured │1.0         │                │
│fishes and shellfishes      │            │                │
├──────────────┼──────┼────────┤
│Infant and baby foods       │0.2         │                │
├──────────────┼──────┼────────┤
│Paper-made packaging        │5.0         │                │
│materials, containers and   │            │                │
│packages for foods          │            │                │
└──────────────┴──────┴────────┘
This Standard shall be implemented from the date of promulgation.
